description: I think the flavor-rxtx extension needs to use a prefix for the values it inserts into flavor lists, and appropriate XML namespace.
title: flavor-rxtx in v3 api should have a prefix for its values

comments.content: I think the flavor-rxtx extension needs to use a prefix for the values it inserts into flavor lists, and appropriate XML namespace.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~johngarbutt

comments.content: Lack of a prefix is currently a consistency bug, but I think it should be fixed by making it core like the other flavor plugins.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cyeoh-0

comments.content:
Looks like the consensus is to not to make flavor-rxtx core, so we should add the prefixes after all

https://etherpad.openstack.org/p/NovaV3APICore
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cyeoh-0

comments.content:
Seems like this issue is in progress already, https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/1252986

But since the other bug (https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/1252986)  was filed after this bug. I have marked that bug as a dup.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~kanaderohan
